026package com.ibm.streams.function.samples.math;
027
028import org.apache.commons.math3.util.CombinatoricsUtils;
029
030import com.ibm.streams.function.model.Function;
031import com.ibm.streams.operator.model.Namespace;
032
033/**
034 * Sample mathematical SPL Java native functions.
035 * Functions that call static methods in
036 * {@code java.lang.Math} or {@code org.apache.commons.math3.util.MathUtils}
037 * and are annotated with {@link Function} to expose them as SPL native functions.
038 * <BR>
039 * The SPL namespace of the functions is defined by the
040 * {@link Namespace} annotation
041 * applied to this class's package {@link com.ibm.streams.function.samples.math}.
042 */
043public class MathFunctions {
044    
045    /**
046     * Only expose the static methods.
047     */
048    private MathFunctions() {}
049    
050    /**
051     * Returns the hyperbolic cosine of a double value.
052     * @param v The value to calculate the hyperbolic cosine of.
053     * @return The hyperbolic cosine of {@code v}.
054     */
055    @Function(description="Returns the hyperbolic cosine of a `float64` value.")
056    public static double cosh(double v) {
057        return Math.cosh(v);
058    }
059    
060    /**
061     * Returns the hyperbolic sine of a double value.
062     * @param v The value to calculate the hyperbolic sine of.
063     * @return The hyperbolic sine of {@code v}.
064     */
065    @Function(description="Returns the hyperbolic sine of a `float64` value.")
066    public static double sinh(double v) {
067        return Math.sinh(v);
068    }
069    /**
070     * Returns the hyperbolic tangent of a double value.
071     * @param v The value to calculate the hyperbolic tangent of.
072     * @return The hyperbolic tangent of {@code v}.
073     */
074    @Function(description="Returns the hyperbolic tangent of a `float64` value.")
075    public static double tanh(double v) {
076        return Math.tanh(v);
077    }
078    
079    /**
080     * Returns <code>&radic;(x<sup>2</sup> + y<sup>2</sup>)</code>.
081     * @param x a value
082     * @param y a value
083     * @return <code>&radic;(x<sup>2</sup> + y<sup>2</sup>)</code>
084     */
085    @Function(name="hypotenuse", description="Returns the square root of `x` squared plus `y` squared.")
086    public static double hypot(double x, double y) {
087        return Math.hypot(x, y);
088    }
089    
090    /**
091     * Returns {@code n!} ({@code n} factorial).
092     * @param n Value to calculate the factorial of.
093     * @return {@code n!}
094     */
095    @Function(description="Returns `n!` (`n` factorial).")
096    public static long factorial(int n) {
097        return CombinatoricsUtils.factorial(n);
098    }
099}
